page.title: 05Likes and Dislikes
page.content: When the children made enquiries for this study, they asked people what they liked about the village or what altera- tions they might like. {LIKES} Friendly place;lovely country- side;quiet;big gardens;near to town but in country;nice school;good services; near East Coast;clean;wide skies;clubs& societies;centrally placed;good Church life;company for children;two shops; nice size; plenty of trees. {ALTERATIONS}Health Centre;By-pass;gas; more street lights;speed limit enforced public benches;street crossing;pub near centre of village;village policeman;tea shop;pedestrianise Elms Close;rumble strips;petrol station with full garage services;verges tidier;more paths&buses We used to have a village policeman.We used to have a roadman living in the village but now a verge cutter comes from Bury twice a year.
